Investor_0_pre_2.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0_pre_2.content: My reputation has been affected by this investment process. I acknowledge that I exhibited a level of naivety by placing excessive trust in the trustee's proposed allocation plan without sufficient scrutiny of its execution. This has highlighted the need for me to be more vigilant and rigorous in assessing potential trustees to better safeguard my interests. Overall, I see myself as a cautious investor who is learning to adapt and refine my evaluation processes to enhance future investment success.

Investor_0_pre_4.name: Liam OConnor
Investor_0_pre_4.content: My reputation has been impacted by this transaction process. I initially placed my trust in the trustee's allocation plan without adequate assessment of his reliability, which has proven to be a mistake. This experience has underscored the importance of conducting thorough evaluations of potential trustees to protect my interests. Consequently, I view myself as a cautious investor who is committed to learning from this experience to refine my evaluation procedures moving forward.

Trustee_0_pre_5.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0_pre_5.content: During this investment process, I executed the profit distribution flawlessly as per the agreed allocation plan. However, I realized that my initial trust in a previously unvetted strategy led to suboptimal decision-making. Learning from this experience, I will focus on thorough due diligence and clearer communication in future transactions to solidify my reputation as a trustworthy and competent trustee.

Trustee_0_pre_6.name: Liam OConnor
Trustee_0_pre_6.content: Following the rejection of my allocation plan, there is a need for introspection regarding my reputation. Despite proposing a common profit-sharing model, my perceived low reputation has led to skepticism from investors. I acknowledge the need for more rigorous strategies and improved transparency to enhance my trustworthiness and competence as a trustee. Moving forward, I will prioritize thorough due diligence and better communication to build stronger relationships with potential investors.
